scripts.postinstall: cd api && yarn install && cd ../models && yarn install && cd ../angular-app && yarn install
scripts.start: echo "▶️  Starting local environment..." && pm2 kill && yarn build:api && pm2 start config/local-ecosystem.config.js
scripts.debug: echo "🐞 ▶️  Starting local (debug) environment..." && pm2 kill && pm2 start config/debug-local-ecosystem.config.js
scripts.mongod:auth-disabled: echo "🍃🔓  Starting MongoDB (open authorization)" && cd mongodb && pm2 start --name "mongod" npm -- run start
scripts.mongod:auth-enabled: echo "🍃🔒  Starting MongoDB" && cd mongodb && pm2 start --name "mongod" npm -- run start:auth-enabled
scripts.mongodb:reset-admin: echo "👤 ♻️  Re-creating MongoDB admin user" && pm2 kill && yarn mongod:auth-disabled && cd mongodb && yarn create:admin
scripts.mongodb:reset-app-users: echo "👥  ♻️ Re-creating MongoDB app users" && pm2 kill && yarn mongod:auth-enabled && cd mongodb && yarn create:app-users
scripts.mongodb:reset-users: echo "♻️  Re-creating MongoDB users" && yarn mongodb:reset-admin && yarn mongodb:reset-app-users
scripts.build:api: echo "☁️  Building api" && cd api && yarn rebuild
scripts.build:models: echo "🗳  Building models" && cd models && yarn rebuild
